info.title: Maintenance Order - Read
info.description:
This service enables you to create, read, updated and delete maintenance order data. It contains order header, operation, component, object list item, operation relationship, long text and settlement rule nodes. The service is based on the OData V2 protocol, and can be consumed in external systems, Fiori applications and on other user interfaces.

If there are any issues when retrieving the maintenance order data, the system displays appropriate warning or error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete maintenance order data synchronously using this inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Asset Management: Maintenance Order Operation (EAMS_AFVC)
* Asset Management: Maintenance Order (EAMS_ORD)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

tags.name: Detailed Cost Analysis in Maint. Order
History MaintOrder settlm rules (posted in parallel ledgers)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET MaintenanceOrder HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
